title: Marketplace for Tuesday, June 25, 2013
teaser: President Obama unveils his plans for climate change policy over the next few years, but how much can he really get done without Congress? Also, Carnival relieves its longtime CEO. And the financial implications of the comeback of a 1980s-era hair style: The hi-top fade.
byline: Jeff Tyler, Adrienne Hill, Sam Beard, Stacey Vanek Smith, Steve Gardner, Sally Herships and Scott Tong
description: President Obama unveils his plans for climate change policy over the next few years, but how much can he really get done without Congress? Also, Carnival relieves its longtime CEO. And the financial implications of the comeback of a 1980s-era hair style: The hi-top fade.
